item.title: This Week’s Japanese Game Releases: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2, Ys X: Proud Nordics, more
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Cotton Reboot! High Tension!, Fuuraiki 5, etc.

Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC, and Ys X: Proud Nordics for Switch 2 are the highlights of this week’s Japanese video game releases.

Also due out this week are Cotton Reboot! High Tension! and Fuuraiki 5 for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch.

Get the full list of this week’s Japanese game releases below. It should be noted that Gematsu will receive a small percentage of money from purchases made through Play-Asia links. You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU2025” coupon code.

Physical and Digital

  • Castlevania Advance Collection (PS4, Switch)
    • Asian Version
      • Standard Edition (PS4, Switch)
      • Limited Edition (PS4, Switch)
  • Cotton Reboot! High Tension! (PS5, Switch)
    • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)
  • Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 (PS5, PS4, Switch)
    • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)
    • Asian Version
      • Standard Edition (PS5, Switch)
      • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)
    • Global release is August 1, but the (digital) Deluxe Edition will be available from July 31.
      • North American Version (PS5, Xbox Series / One, Switch)
      • European Version (PS5, Xbox Series / One, Switch)
  • Fuuraiki 5 (PS5, PS4, Switch)
    • Limited Edition (PS5, PS4, Switch)
  • hololive Holo’s Hanafuda (Switch) – Launching digitally worldwide.
    • Limited Edition (Switch)
  • Japanese Rail Sim: Journey to Kyoto Best Collection (Switch)
  • Kirameki Nurse: Diary Minna o Tasukeru Tenshi no Oshigoto (Switch)
  • Mononoke Chigiri (Switch)
    • Limited Edition (Switch)
  • Noctuary (PS5, Switch) – Launching digitally worldwide.
    • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)
    • Asian Version
      • Standard Edition (PS5, Switch)
      • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)
  • Shirokoi Sakura Gram (PS4, Switch)
    • Limited Edition (PS4, Switch)
    • Haruoto Alice Gram Set (PS4)
  • Steel Empire: Chronicle (Switch)
    • Limited Edition (Switch)
  • Ys VII: Lacrimosa of DANA (PS5) – Already available worldwide.
  • Ys IX: Monstrm Nox (PS5) – Already available worldwide.
  • Ys X: Proud Nordics (Switch 2)

Digital Only

  • 9 Years of Shadows (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One) – Launching worldwide.
  • Achilles: Survivor (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Cotton Reboot! High Tension! (PS4)
  • Day of the Shell (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam, Epic Games Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Dead Take (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Dear me, I was… (Switch 2) – Launching worldwide.
  • Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 (Xbox Series, Xbox One)
    • PC (Steam) version launches August 6 in Japan, but the Deluxe Edition can be played from August 1.
  • Dreaming in Cherry Blossoms, I Fall in Love with You (Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Earthion (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Esophaguys (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Gold Gold Adventure Gold Early Access (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Groove Coaster: Future Performers (Switch)
  • Grounded 2 Game Preview (Xbox Series, PC [Steam, Microsoft Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Heartworm (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • hololive Holo’s Hanafuda (PS5, PS4, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Maiden Cops (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Mystereet: Yasogami Kaoru no Chousen! (PS4, Xbox Series, Switch)
  • NIDANA (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Noctuary (Xbox Series, Xbox One) – Launching worldwide.
  • One-Eyed Likho (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
  • Recharge Early Access (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • SKY THE SCRAPER (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Spell Disk (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Spy Drops (Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Time Flies (PS5, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Troublemaker: Raise Your Gang (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Wargroove 2 (iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.

The PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch titles listed above can be purchased through Japanese PlayStation Network and Nintendo accounts using prepaid cards:

  • PlayStation Store cards (yen): 1,100 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 10,000
  • Nintendo eShop cards (yen): 1,000 / 1,500 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 9,000

Demos, Betas, Updates, etc.

  • Dragon Ball: The Breakers Season 9 (PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Elden Ring Nightring Version 1.02 Update (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Genshin Impact Version 5.8 Update “Sunspray Summer Resort” (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, PC, iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.
  • Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket Expansion “Wisdom of Sea and Sky” (iOS, Android)

item.title: Toxic Crusaders launches December 4
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Side-scrolling beat 'em up game dated.

Side-scrolling beat ’em up game Toxic Crusaders will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on December 4 for $24.99, developer Retroware announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

When the evil Dr. Killemoff attacks, only one team of hideously deformed creatures of superhuman size and strength stands between him and his plans for global pollution: the Toxic Crusaders, earth’s last, greatest and ugliest hope for survival! The hottest heroes of 1991 return for a radical, radioactive beat ’em up for a new era, featuring awesome action, crushing combos and more toxic waste than you’ll know what to do with!

It’s Clean-Up Time!

Choose from seven playable characters, including Toxie, No-Zone, Junkyard, Major Disaster and Headbanger (who would technically count as two characters if they could only agree on something)—plus, for the first time, play as Toxie’s musically “gifted” girlfriend Yvonne, and the mother of all mothers, Mrs. Junko, Toxie’s mom!

Battle across seven disgusting levels rendered in beautiful full-color pixel art as you defend Tromaville from hordes of Radiation Rangers, mutated thugs and zombie chickens. The odds might be stacked against you but with awesome powers, a winning personality and up to four-player local co-up on your side, the Smogulan Empire’s days are numbered!

Straight Outta Tromaville!

Take a deep breath and dive deep into an action-packed, pun-filled adventure that drags you kicking and screaming through the wonderful world of Troma. Enjoy cameos from gore-filled classics such as Class of Nuke ‘Em High, Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead, and Sgt. Kabukiman N.Y.P.D.—reimagined in the Saturday morning cartoon style that made this franchise so unforgettable!

Key Features

  • The triumphant return of the Toxic Crusaders, just when we needed them most!
  • Pulse-pounding beat ’em up action for up to four players.
  • Gorgeous full-color pixel art graphics.
  • A stunning soundtrack that’ll make you party like it’s 1991.
  • Amazing comic book cutscenes featuring the voices of TeamFourStar (Dragon Ball Z Abridged).
  • Seven playable characters, each with their own unique moves and powers.
  • Seven unique stages taking you from the streets of Tromaville to Planet Smogula and beyond!
  • Surprise cameos (each more surprising than the last) from across the Troma Cinematic Universe!

Watch a new trailer below.

Announce Trailer
